schema.similarity_pairs: List(Struct([Field('selected_feature_id', Int64), Field('decoder_cosine_similarity', Float64), Field('num_main_examples', Int64), Field('num_selected_examples', Int64), Field('main_prompt_ids', List(Int64)), Field('selected_prompt_ids', List(Int64)), Field('semantic_similarity', Float64), Field('ngram_jaccard_similarity', List(Float64)), Field('top_common_ngrams', List(Struct([Field('ngram', Utf8), Field('ngram_size', Int64), Field('count', Int64), Field('occurrences', List(Struct([Field('feature_id', Int64), Field('prompt_id', Int64), Field('positions', List(Int64))])))])))]))

config_used.description: Configuration for calculating inter-feature activation similarity metrics between decoder-similar features with positional n-gram analysis

dependencies: 3_features_parquet.py must be run first (for decoder_similarity field)
4_act_embeddings.py must be run first (for pre-computed embeddings)
processing_notes.pairwise_computation: 4 main examples × 4 selected examples = 16 pairs per comparison

field_descriptions.num_similar_features_analyzed: Number of decoder-similar features successfully analyzed (up to 4)
field_descriptions.similarity_pairs: List of similarity metrics for each decoder-similar feature pair
field_descriptions.selected_feature_id: ID of the decoder-similar feature being compared
field_descriptions.decoder_cosine_similarity: Decoder weight cosine similarity (reason for selection)
field_descriptions.num_main_examples: Number of examples from main feature (up to 4)
field_descriptions.num_selected_examples: Number of examples from selected feature (up to 4)
field_descriptions.main_prompt_ids: List of prompt IDs analyzed from main feature
field_descriptions.selected_prompt_ids: List of prompt IDs analyzed from selected feature
field_descriptions.semantic_similarity: Average pairwise cosine similarity of embeddings (4×4=16 pairs)
field_descriptions.top_common_ngrams: Most frequent n-grams across combined examples with feature and position tracking
field_descriptions.occurrences: List of occurrences with feature_id, prompt_id, and positions
field_descriptions.feature_id_occurrence: Which feature the occurrence belongs to (main or selected)
field_descriptions.positions: List of token positions where the n-gram appears in the activation window
